attributes.action: Change the law that all PARENTS have equality irrespective of there sex
attributes.additional_details:
When a child is born that child is now looked after the PARENT/S, not the mother or father but the PARENT/S
You can have to 2 males/ 2 females who can raise a child. They are both regarded as PARENTS.
A PARENT has a role, obligation and duty to make sure their child is looked after and cared for in the right way and that the child’s wellbeing is first and foremast the most important thing.
THIS IS WRONG. All parents should be given EQUAL rights irrespective of there sex.
attributes.background: For a long time fathers have tried to fight for there rights as a Parent. It is now time that the government as well as all organisations realise that a PARENT does NOT have a sex but a duty and obligation for the well being of there child.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You'll need to give your full name in order to start a new petition. 

You might like to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/257930
